issue.title: [CF 449] Buff/Debuff Collections missing in Conditions
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Go into Conditions dialog of an icon, chose Buff/Debuff
2. Try to use a Buff collection (for example BonusAgiStr or BonusStamina)
3. see that they don't show up in the list or work in any way

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I would expect the Buff Collections to work regardless of the dialog I'm in, as long as I use a Buff/Debuff Tracker. It does not.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.8.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
There is none.

comments.body:
The tooltips for buff/debuff conditions clearly state that only the first buff/debuff entered will be tracked. Equivalencies are expanded for conditions, but only the first buff/debuff in them will be tracked by the condition - all other will be ignored. There is a reason that they aren't in the suggestion list for conditions.

If you need to check an entire buff/debuff category in a condition, you will need to create a buff/debuff icon to track the equivalency and then track that icon using an icon shown condition.
